00022 #include <ArrOfInt.h>
00023 #include <Double.h>
00024 #include <Convection_tools.h>
00025 
00026 //
00027 // Fonctions limiteurs de MUSCL
00028 //
00029 
00030 
00031 double minmod(double grad1, double grad2)
00032 {
00033   double gradlim=0.;
00034   if(grad1*grad2>0.) (dabs(grad1)<dabs(grad2)) ? gradlim=grad1 : gradlim=grad2 ;
00035   return gradlim;
00036 }
00037 
00038 double vanleer(double grad1, double grad2)
00039 {
00040   double gradlim=0.;
00041   if(grad1*grad2>0.) gradlim=2.*grad1*grad2/(grad1+grad2) ;
00042   return gradlim;
00043 }
00044 
00045 double vanalbada(double grad1, double grad2)
00046 {
00047   double gradlim=0.;
00048   if(grad1*grad2>0.) gradlim=grad1*grad2*(grad1+grad2)/(grad1*grad1+grad2*grad2) ;
00049   return gradlim;
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 double chakravarthy(double grad1, double grad2)
00054 {
00055   /*
00056     Cerr << " limiteur chakavarthy non preconise (non symetrique) " << finl;
00057     exit();
00058     return 0;
00059   */
00060   double gradlim=0.;
00061   if ((grad1*grad2)>0)
00062     {
00063       gradlim=dmin(grad1/grad2,1.8); //!< 1<<beta<<2
00064       gradlim=dmax(gradlim,0.);
00065       gradlim*=grad2;
00066     }
00067   return gradlim;
00068 }
00069 
00070 double superbee(double grad1, double grad2)
00071 {
00072   /*
00073     Cerr << " limiteur superbee non preconise (source d'instabilites) " << finl;
00074     exit();
00075     return 0;
00076   */
00077   double gradlim=0.;
00078   if ((grad1*grad2)>0)
00079     {
00080       double gradlim1,gradlim2;
00081       gradlim1=dmin(2*(grad1/grad2),1);
00082       gradlim2=dmin(grad1/grad2,2);
00083       gradlim=dmax(gradlim1,gradlim2);
00084       gradlim=dmax(gradlim,0.);
00085       gradlim*=grad2;
00086     }
00087   return gradlim;
00088 }
